description: This file defines mock classes for telemetry testing, including TelemetryApiImplMock and TelemetryNotificationMock, utilizing Google Mock to simulate telemetry behavior and notification handling.

classes.name: TelemetryApiImplMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of TelemetryApiImpl and ITelemetry, providing mocked methods for telemetry operations.

classes.name: TelemetryNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of ITelemetry::INotification for telemetry upload notifications.

methods.name: t2_init
methods.description: Mocked method for initializing telemetry with a component.

methods.name: t2_event_s
methods.description: Mocked method for sending telemetry events.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocked method for registering a notification.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocked method for unregistering a notification.

methods.name: SetReportProfileStatus
methods.description: Mocked method to set telemetry report profile status.

methods.name: LogApplicationEvent
methods.description: Mocked method to log application-specific events.

methods.name: UploadReport
methods.description: Mocked method to trigger report upload.

methods.name: AbortReport
methods.description: Mocked method to abort telemetry report.

methods.name: SetOptOutTelemetry
methods.description: Mocked method to set telemetry opt-out status.

methods.name: IsOptOutTelemetry
methods.description: Mocked method to query telemetry opt-out status.

methods.name: OnReportUpload
methods.description: Mocked method for handling telemetry report upload notifications.
